title: WTB or Trade for Doolan Batting

posts.post_title: WTB or Trade for Doolan Batting
posts.post_content:
If anyone has any Doolan batting available please let me know! I’m especially looking for Sweet Caporal 350 fac 25 and Piedmont 350/460 Fac42 for my back run. I will look at any if available for an upgrade. 

Thank you! 
Michael
